name: Medpace Holdings, Inc.
description: Medpace Holdings, Inc. is a global, full-service clinical contract research organization (CRO) that provides comprehensive drug development services to the pharmaceutical and biotechnology industries. Founded in 1992 and headquartered in Cincinnati, Ohio, Medpace specializes in clinical trial management, biostatistics, regulatory affairs, and laboratory services. The company supports its clients throughout the entire drug development process, from preclinical studies to post-marketing activities. Medpace's unique operating model integrates scientific expertise with operational excellence, enabling it to deliver high-quality data and insights efficiently. With a focus on therapeutic areas such as oncology, cardiology, endocrinology, and infectious diseases, Medpace has established itself as a trusted partner for companies seeking to bring new therapies to market. The firm is committed to advancing medical research while ensuring compliance with the highest standards of regulatory requirements. Medpace's global presence, with facilities and staff across North America, Europe, and Asia, allows it to conduct clinical trials in diverse populations, enhancing the applicability and robustness of study results. The company prioritizes innovation and technology, leveraging data-driven methodologies and advanced analytics to improve study design and execution. Medpace's mission is to accelerate the development of safe and effective medical treatments, making a meaningful impact on patient health worldwide.
ceo: Augusto A. D. O. A. C. C. (Gus) V. C. K. D. A. C. C. M. C.
